Package ru.nordavind.ecgdonglelib.filter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IFilter
    Information of a single filter
    IScanFilters
    Filters for a scan
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Filter
    Represents Hi-pass and Low-pass filters Filter.frequency field holds filter frequency in Hz
    FilterSettings
    Class used to configure filters
    MedianFilter
    represents a median filter
    RejectionFilter
    Contains settings of a Rejection filter
    ScanFilterInfo
    Holds information of scan filters Filters include: 1.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FilterSettings.UpperFrequency  
    FilterType
    Filter types
